ComicInfo.Summary:
Jago is under attack by the Coven’s wendigo army – but the unexpected arrival of Tusk turns the tide of the battle! The two warriors compare notes – and decided to investigate the loss of their guardian spirits! Meanwhile, the ancient sorcerer Kan-Ra begins his own investigations...
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Yildiray Cinar | 1 | B | Cover B | Jonathan Lau | 2 | C | Subscription Cover C | Cam Adams | 3 | D/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Jonathan Lau | 4 | E/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Yildiray Cinar | 5 | Note: The digital edition (1/10/2018) for this issue was released before the print edition.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-28 21:54:30. [CVDB653024]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Cam Adams, Jonathan Ang Lau, Yildiray Cinar
ComicInfo.Characters: Aganos, Jago, Kan-Ra, Kim Wu, Mira Fallegeros, Tusk
